detail_desc: Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Jumper in a soft chunky knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bucket hat in cotton twill. Lined. Width of brim approx. 5 cm.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist, side pockets, detachable tie belt and tapered legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a print motif on the front and a ribbed neckline.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, flounces at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sun hat in a patterned cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Jacket in an airy, patterned weave with short, wide sleeves and a narrow tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a wrapover drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and slim, tapered legs.
Satin sandals with straps over the foot and concealed elastication at the heel. Imitation leather linings and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 10 cm.
Jersey T-shirt.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and decorative buttons at the front.
Trousers in a cool linen and cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
Waist belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.4 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with a V-neck at the back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace-trimmed, asymmetric cuffs, slits in the sides and a lace trim at the hem.

Shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, a small embroidered detail on the chest and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Contrasting colour in the inside of the collar and cuffs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Nightdress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with short, elasticated raglan sleeves and an elasticated neckline.
Jersey cap in a cotton blend with an inner terry sweatband and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Scarf in soft fabric with fringes on the short sides.
Trainers in glittery imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a padded edge and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Leggings in sturdy jersey with wide elastication at the waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a gathered V-neck, pleat at the front, slit at the cuffs, and rounded hem.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed button at the top. Lined.
Long-sleeved jersey top in a silk blend with stitched seams front and back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide lightly padded shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Hipster briefs in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Polo shirt in piqué made from a cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip at the top. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. The polo shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams. Zip fly and press-stud, a zipped front pocket, a reflective strip on one leg and reinforced hems with snow flaps. Adjustable, elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Swim shorts and top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined front. UPF 50.
Short dress in chiffon with a V-neck, seam with a small frill trim below the bust, and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill at the cuffs. A-line cut to the hem. Jersey lining.

Body in lace with a cut-out section at the front and a super push-up bra with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and medium coverage at the back.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Short, double-breasted coat in woven fabric with notch lapels and long sleeves with a tab at the cuffs. Handwarmer pockets, large patch front pockets and a single back vent. Recycled polyester lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined, patterned bikini top in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with lightly padded triangular cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey with embroidery on the chest.
Metal earrings in various designs, one pair with plastic bead pendants. Sizes from 3.5 to 4 cm.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Concealed elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-cut blouse with a smocked stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a frill and smocking at the cuffs.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.

Tunic in an airy cotton weave with embroidery at the front. Small, pompom-trimmed stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front with narrow ties at the top and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the hips with a pompom trim and a lined, flared tier to the hem.
Knee-length wrap dress in patterned chiffon crêpe with short sleeves, ties at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Blouse in woven fabric with a high, frill-trimmed smocked collar and an opening with buttons at the back of the neck. V-shaped seam with a wide flounced trim at the front, and long sleeves with wide smocking at the cuffs. Unlined.
Glittery, fabric-covered Alice band with different-coloured flowers on top and tulle at the ends. Matching wand with a glittery, padded butterfly and satin ribbons at the top.
Dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, elasticated sleeves. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, motif on the front and cut-out sections at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
Printed top and leggings. Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with decorative appliqués and a print at the top. Narrow, elasticated seam at the top and wrists, and a plastic hook-and-eye fastener to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.
Fully-fashioned trainers with details in imitation leather. Elasticated top edge, a loop front and back, and elasticated lacing with a drawstring at the top. Mesh insoles and patterned soles.
Large metal clip earrings with faceted plastic stones and sparkly stones. Length approx. 10 cm.
Moss-knit cardigan in soft cotton with a single button and two pockets at the front and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small frilled collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long, raglan balloon sleeves with a narrow, decorative frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Recycled polyester lining.
Bracelets in various styles with wooden beads.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a high waist and zip at the back.
Wide tunic in a cool, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and short sleeves. Vertical seam down the front and back and soft draping.
Jumper knitted in soft cashmere. Short raglan sleeves with ribbed trims and ribbing around the neckline and hem.
Fine-knit jumper containing some wool with long sleeves with embroidery at the cuffs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Opening at the back with a button and a frill at the front that continues over the shoulders. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless, padded dinosaur fancy dress costume with a hook and loop fastening at the back, long legs with elasticated hems and a detachable tail.
Sports top in marled, fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and visible seams.
